actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to request the Internal Revenue Service to re-evaluate the present tax deduction for the business use of automobiles.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that the Internal Revenue Service reevaluate the present twelve cent per mile tax deduction for the business use of automobiles due to the rising cost of gasoline, and readjust this figure to reflect current costs.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to request the Internal Revenue Service to re-evaluate the present tax deduction for the business use of automobiles.
